name: Radiation Rush
description:
Your hazmat suit has broken and you must escape the radiation of your planet before it's too late! Pick up power-ups to aid you in your journey, but be careful... they will mutate you and increase your radiation levels, reducing the amount of time you have to escape!

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
    • S to quick drop when corresponding power-up is active
  • SPACE to jump
  • E to pick up and put back power-ups

This game was made for the Ludum Dare Discord 5 game jam!
